coffees.title: Classic Cappuccino
coffees.description: A classic cappuccino is a harmonious blend of espresso, steamed milk, and velvety microfoam. This iconic Italian coffee creation captivates the senses with a rich, bold espresso base, topped with a luscious layer of frothy milk that balances the intensity of the coffee. Served in a small cup, the cappuccino is a timeless indulgence, celebrated for its perfect marriage of strong flavors and creamy texture.

coffees.title: Caramel Cappuccino
coffees.description: A Caramel Cappuccino is a delightful fusion of robust espresso, steamed milk, and a decadent swirl of caramel syrup. This indulgent blend marries the boldness of coffee with a velvety texture, while the sweet caramel adds a touch of luxury to every sip. It's a delicious and comforting twist on the classic cappuccino, perfect for those who crave a harmonious balance of rich flavors and sweetness in their coffee.

coffees.title: Hazelnut Cappuccino
coffees.description: The Hazelnut Cappuccino is a luscious blend of espresso, steamed milk, and the inviting essence of hazelnut. Enjoy the rich harmony of bold coffee and nutty sweetness in every sip, topped with velvety microfoam. It's a delightful twist on the classic cappuccino, adding warmth and indulgence to your coffee experience.

coffees.title: Flavored Cappuccino
coffees.description: The Flavored Cappuccino is a delightful variation that infuses the classic espresso and steamed milk duo with a burst of enticing flavor. Whether it's vanilla, caramel, hazelnut, or another tempting option, each sip is a harmonious blend of robust coffee and the chosen flavor profile. Topped with creamy microfoam, this cappuccino offers a unique and indulgent twist on the traditional, providing a rich and satisfying experience for those seeking a touch of flair in their coffee ritual.
